mapper.insert: insert into sys_config (id, sys_key, sys_value, status, remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sysKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select id, sys_key, sys_value, status, remark from sys_config
mapper.insert: insert into sys_config (id, sys_key, sys_value, status, remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sysKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select id, sys_key, sys_value, status, remark from sys_config
mapper.insert: insert into sys_config (variable, value, set_time, set_by) values (#{variable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{setTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{setBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select variable, value, set_time, set_by from sys_config
